nedarlanthayedi athadanguwata gath el. ti. ti. ee. sakakaruwan athara koti sanwidhanaye prabalama samajikayeku sitina bawata wartha weyi.nedarlanthayedi kotinta mudal ekathu kala damila jathikayin 7 deneku pasugiya (26) da erata polisiya magin athadanguwata gena atha.me pirisa nedarlanthaye kriyathmaka wiwidha demala sanwidhanawala kriyakarin bawa da, demala punaruththapana sanwidhanaya, demala sambandhikarana kamituwa, demala tharuna sanwidhanaya, demala kantha sanwidhanaya, nedarlanthaye demala kala ha sanskruthika sansadaya aadiya ee athara wana bawa da thanapathi aaranchi marga sandahan karayi.mema prabala samajikaya athadanguwata ganna awasthawedi pransha gaman balapathrayakin peni sita athayi da sandahan we.mema sakakaruwange niwasa ha wyapara pariksha kirimedi yuro 40000 ka mudalak polisiya magin soyagena athi athara pariganaka, lipi drawya, jangama durakathana, di. wi. di. thati aadi upakarana kipayak da soyagena atha.

lassana mal bandunak api nodanuwathwama hari hithalama hari binda kiyala hithamu.kallen kalla aayi aragena alawala hari gassanna puluwan wewida?hari gassuwath ee thibichcha lassanama aayi ganna puluwanda?ee monawa wunath bindichcha hithak aayi kochchara dangaluwath aayi thibuna wagema hari gassanna puluwanda?wisheshayenma api ridduwe kellekuge hithak nam,ee hithata api aadaraya kalanam,api danuwathwa hari nodanuwathwa hari ee hitha parapu eka yam welawaka apiwama riddanna gannawa.

nagaradhipathi sepala ashoka mahatha, madhyama kandukaraye nuwaraeliya disthrikkaye mandaposhanayen pelena daruwange prathishathaya wadiwi athi bawin rajaya pradeshiya washayen jalashawala mathsya sampatha diyunu kirimata katayuthu yedu bawa da, prathama piyawara lesa me miridiya dhiwara samithiya aarambha kala bawa da prakasha kaleya.miridiya dhiwara sanwardhana niladhari mehidi adahas dakwamin, pradeshaye janathawa mandaposhanayen mudaganimata kadinam piyawarak lesa abhyanthara jalashawala miridiya dhiwara karmanthaya nangasituwimata rajaya katayuthu yoda athayi danwiya.pradeshaye athi siyaluma jalashawala miridiya masun bokirime wyapruthiyak aarambha kara poshanayen itha ihala masun warga bokarana bawath, pasukalina miridiya masun allimata saha pasu aswanu labaganimata menma athuru nishpadana lesa wiyali karawala nishpadanaya karana bawath pawasiya.thalawakale eksath miridiya dhiwara samithiye nawa niladhari mandalaya.sabhapathi - suren amaradiwaran, lekam – riswan disan, bhandagarika - robat palaniyandi, karaka sabhawata 9 denakugen yuth samajika sankhyawak da pathkara ganna ladi..

emenma heta (29) saha anidda (30) dedina thula dansal pariksha kirime katayuthu sidu kerena bawada ohu sandahan kala.esema dansal liyapadinchiya athyawashya bawayi saukhya sewa adhyaksha janaral wisheshagnya waidya anil jasinha kiya sitiye.me athara wesak sathiye kolambaa nagarayata paminena janathawage aarakshawa wenuwen wishesha wadapiliwelak kriyathmaka bawa polisiya prakasha kala.pasugiyada kolambaa pawathi madhya hamuwakadi polis madhya prakashaka polis adhikari ruwan gunasekara sandahan kale kolambaa nagaraye rajakari katayuthu sandaha polis niladharin 3000 k pamana yedawimata salasum kara athi bawayi.me athara, wesak sathiya nimiththen lanka gamanagamana mandalaya saha dumriya departhamenthuwa wishesha gamanagamana pahasukam da salasa thibenawa.
